alert.note: Alert for Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 3:42PM CDT until July 22 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Walthall County in southern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 342 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Topeka, or 11 miles southwest of Monticello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salem. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
